effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.

flavor_text.x_y: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
